title: So upon getting out of bronze, i learned a few things.
body: Silver, is much, much worse. Take everything you know of bronze 5, and multiply it by 2. That is silver ina  nutshell. I honestly thought "hey ill get out of bronze and itll get better" Man was i wrong. I got 3 trolls in one game. 3! I don't think i have ever gotten more than two in my history of playing this game. Like how! How are there 1,2,3 trolls! Jesus. This game is so frustrating to the point where i dont even enjoy norms anymore.

replies.body:
Low silver players mostly just got out of bronze, and are incredibly arrogant about it. This leads to all sorts of idiocy like feeding when they get lane countered, and general salt and tears.

It gets steadily better as you get higher, then starts against at gold V.
I personally have found it easier playing at night because 12 year olds arent on at midnight and i get surprisingly less feeders, but still it is ridiculous :c

Hope you get a better team next time.
 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
